reviews.review: This game is very addicting! It is fun when playing with friends or running solo.
Serdecznie polecam gierkę, Bardzo dobra grafika i przede wszystkim świetna rozgrywka. OGÓLNIE GENIALNA GIERA WARTA CENY! Jak będzie przecena polecam kupować.
Люблю играть за убийцу. Выжившие с кинжалом крысы. Пишу обзор ради значка
This game legit scares the crap out of me

クロスプレイのおかげで人は増えたが、その分外れのサバイバーと当たることも多い。
紫、赤帯でも、正直判断が甘い人が多いのでサバイバーは2人以上でやることをおすすめします。
自分自身、キラーをあまり触れていないので詳しいことはよくわかりませんが、サバイバーに関しては
ネタパーク構成でも、おもしろパーク構成でも脱出は簡単です。
キラーは自分の感覚だとパークとキャラ性能ありきかなと感じます。
そのパークもキャラもやり込み&課金が必要となるので深みにはまらないほうが身のためかもしれません....。

Dead By Daylight dışarıdan baktığınızda hep aynı şeyin yapıldığı tekrara düşen bir oyun gibi gözüküyor. Oyunu oynadıkça bu bakış açınız değişiyor ve aslında içerisinde türlü çeşitlilikler barındıran bir oyun olduğunu anlıyorsunuz. Elbette oyunda kötü olan oynanış unsurları da var fakat bu tarz durumlara genellikle oyun yapımcıları el attığından eskiye oranla oldukça az olduğundan bu tam anlamıyla bir eksi olarak düşünülemez.
Игра понравилась, но очень часто убивают( Динамично бомбит пукан, но игра классная. DbD top
É muito bom, melhor ainda para se jogar com os amigos. kkkkkkkkkk da pra dar muita risada mesmo em um estilo de jogo diferente
Топ игра. Наиграл 150 часов всё топ
Dead by daylight more like Not alive till mornin'
I heard you get decent around 1,000 hours. I hope so....

This game needs better matchmaking system asap. Chasing rank 1 swf team while playing rank 13 killer is not that funny. 
It's 12.06.21 matchmaking system is still so bad but at least I am an Iridescent I killer now.

UPDATE:
I change my review to positive becasue the devs hear US, and work in the patch, so ty.



PAST REVIEW:
best game until the new update feb 9-2021, trash update. now you cant 360 the killer and zig zag them, the hit box of the killers is really really long, climb to rank 1 it is impossible now.

the physics of the game sucks, instead of getting better, it gets worse.

Единственная в своем роде игра.
Первые 2 часа скорее всего вы будете чувствовать как будто вы играете в хоррор, дальше до часов 10 вы будете просто играть и осваивать механики, от 10 и до бесконечности идет соревнование. Составление билдов, умение убегать или обманывать манов, уметь юзать абилки маньяков и т.д. 

Графон неплохой, но можно и лучше. Сюжета как такового нет, только лор. Геймплей быстро надоедает - за часов 15, а дальше только соревнование. 

Если кратко - соревновательная игра в стиле маньяк и 4 выживших.
Брать советую, но лучше со скидкой
Игра хорошая, очинь нравица, но очинь страшная
O jogo tem uma ótima jogabilidade e sempre atualiza com coisas novas pra modificar o padrão. Mas a maior nostalgia é você ver um killer de um personagem que você conhece.
Very fun game. buggy and frustrating but fun. much better with friends
great game to play with your friends. 10/10
Alto jueguito rey epicardo, buenardo el jueguito de masiado buenoooooo muchos tiros cuchillos y pum banda de cosas
This Game is the most fun I have ever had killer is fun but survivor is only really fun with friends

Recomendadisimo.
-Actualizaciones constantes con nuevos asesinos y supervivientes que le dan más vida al juego,
-divertido con para jugar con amigos

La mayor contra son las personas que juegan de forma sucia... pero hay de todo
Muito bom esse jogo meu Deus !!!
Gran juego. Dicho esto, hay que destacar que sufre de un gran desbalanceo difícilmente solucionable debido al concepto mismo del juego.
Jogo que mais jogo neste momento e que nunca deixei de jogar
Миша что это за херня на нас бежит , бляяя Толик это монстр , страшно вырубай !
Pretty good, but pretty bad, but also pretty good
Kanser olsa da oynama süremden anlayacağınız üzere kendine bağlıyor.
needs some changes and middle east servers but other than that, game is perfect and its exactly my type of games. (also fix the bugs because we also want to think you did a good job so far)

Very Pog 
Edit: Its been about 5 months since i wrote this review, I stand corrected.
Edit 2: Why am I still playing this game, it's been 9 months now.
Edit 3: Year and a half, I hate this game.

Güzel oyun tavisye ederim.Yılın oynu bence DEAD BY DAYLIGHT herkese tavsiye ediyorum. EDİT:  anlık 800 saati geçmiş bulunmaktayım mükemmel oyun soloda sarıyor mp de sarıyor alın oynayın aq sevmesseniz bana sövün xd

Você vai falar que o jogo é ruim, horrivel, lixo, merda, bosta, fezes, e ainda assim vai jogar :)

Afinal esse jogo é tenebroso :)

game has pretty women

(edit: DO NOT BUY THIS GAME!!!! it will make you go insane it is so bad)

Très bon jeu entre amis ou avec des joueurs sur le net. Bon faut pas trop ce fier aux joueurs cancers que vous allez rencontrer. Beaucoup de personnages et tueurs a pouvoir évoluer et des heures et des heures à tester différents combo selon votre manière de jouer. Très satisfait de mon achat ça faisait un moment que j'avais pas trouver un bon jeu qui mélange le coopératif, le stratégique et aussi le côté immersif. Des frissons et du stress garantie sans oublier une ligne mince entre la victoire et la défaite.

I think we did a pretty good job so far xD

Esta bueno.
Nice game a bit hard in the beginning specially when you play as a surviver
Aqui tem mais toxicidade que lol, csgo, etc... recomendo 10/10!
Afk kalan mı cheat yapan mı dersin geçilmiyor hiç. Zaten ranked 10 üstüyseniz camp kaçınılmaz tilt olmak için oynayabilirsiniz.
Игра норм,но множественные проблемы ее кнш мешают получать наслаждение.Я лично ее советую ее,но на ваш страх и риск.

First and foremost, i really enjoy the game. It's a solid game. My only critiques is that it takes a long time to get into a game as survivor and the price for the entire game. If they dropped the price on the core game or the DLC, the player base would stay up and fix the matchmaking issue. All that aside, I'll be happy to play the game for the next year and I'm really looking forward to the next DLCs.
天天尼玛吃延迟刀，煞笔官方
Vai tomar no rabo esse jogo mal otimizado e mal balanceado de m3rda
Very fun and scary game. Definitely a ton of fun if you play with friends and communicate your strat ;P
Davvero interessante, meccaniche accurate, texture e animazioni ben fatte.
Uns dos melhores jogos q ja joguei nunca vi um hack mais um poblema dele e o lag e alguns bugs
me arrependir de comprar esse jogo, ele e cheio de hack assim como o killer usa hack que ver pela parede nao tem graça jogar assim.
